com.erdao.android.mapviewutil.markerclusterer
Class GeoClusterer

java.lang.Object
  com.erdao.android.mapviewutil.markerclusterer.GeoClusterer

public class GeoClusterer
extends Object

Class for Clustering geotagged content. this clustering came from "markerclusterer" which is available as opensource at http://code.google.com/p/gmaps-utility-library/ this is android ported version with modification to fit to the application

Author:
Huan Erdao

GeoClusterer

public GeoClusterer(MapView mapView,
                    List<MarkerBitmap> markerIconBmps,

Parameters:
mapView - MapView object.
markerIconBmps - MarkerBitmap objects for icons.
screenDensity - Screen Density.
Method Detail

addItem

public void addItem(GeoItem item)
add item and do clustering. NOTE: this method will not redraw screen. after adding all items, you must call redraw() method.

Parameters:
item - GeoItem to be clustered.

createCluster

public void createCluster(GeoItem item)
Create Cluster Object. override this method, if you want to use custom GeoCluster class.

Parameters:
item - GeoItem to be set to cluster.

getItems

public final List<GeoItem> getItems()
get current GeoItems list.

Returns:
GeoItems list.

redraw

public void redraw()
redraws clusters

zoomInFixing

public void zoomInFixing()
zoom in with selected cluster to be fit within current viewport.

resetViewport

public GeoClusterer.GeoCluster resetViewport()
reset current viewport.

Returns:
current selected cluster object, if null it means no cluster is selected.

clearSelect

public void clearSelect()
clears selected state.

onNotifyDrawFromCluster

public void onNotifyDrawFromCluster()
Hooking draw event from ClusterMarker to detect zoom/move event. hope there will be event notification for android equivalent to javascriptin the future....

onTapCalledFromCluster

public void onTapCalledFromCluster(GeoClusterer.GeoCluster caller,
                                   boolean isTapped)
onTap call from Cluster layer. this method will be called number of times equals to size of clusters. check isTapped to know which cluster was tapped.

Parameters:
caller - cluster object called this.
isTapped - if true, tapped.

onNotifyClearSelectFromCluster

public void onNotifyClearSelectFromCluster(GeoClusterer.GeoCluster caller)
clear cluster event handler.

Parameters:
caller - cluster object called this.

getCluster

public GeoClusterer.GeoCluster getCluster(int pos)
get cluster

Parameters:
pos - position of cluster.
Returns:
GeoCluster object. null if index out of bounds
